name: geochemical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the chemical substances in the earth's crust (= its hard outer layer): High-precision geochemical mapping has been developed to a very high standard. For more detailed work, geologists rely on geochemical surveys and drilling.
More examplesFewer examplesThe agency will conduct geochemical testing to trace the origin of the pollution.Studying geochemical data from springs provides information on the processes that are currently active.There is scope for further geophysical and geochemical studies within the region.
